item.description: The Guided Meditation Summary is as follows: The seven chakras-or spinning "wheels" of energy located along the spine-offer a powerful system for personal transformation. If you want to develop your intuition, communicate more clearly, or step into your power, join Anodea Judith on Chakras: A Beginner's Guide to Healing with Your Body's Energy Centers. In two sessions, you will learn how you can tap into your energetic system to improve your physical, mental and spiritual well-being. Complete with a guided chakra meditation, - expert guidance to help you boost and balance your vital energy. Based on attendee's opinions as to scheduling this guided meditation on a monthly bases/2x a month. Namaste
item.name: A guided meditation: Healing with your body energy center (Chakras)
